title: VIDEO: Family Detention at Dilley Blasted by Former Detainees
tags: Protests of ‘Abolish ICE’ Reach Texas Dems as Trump’s Agents Count the Holes in the DeadThe struggle against ICE has picked up in Texas since the killings of legal observers in Minneapolis and transporting of 5-year-old Liam Ramos to CoreCivic’s Dilley family detention center.DecelerationGreg Harman
